sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-calendar
    v-model="value"
    :events="events"
    color="primary"
    :weekday-format="weekdayFormat"
    :type="type"
    :locales="locales"
    :event-color="getEventColor"
  />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      value: '',
      type: 'month',
      events: [
        {
          name: 'Event 1',
          details: 'Details about event 1',
          start: '2023-05-01',
          end: '2023-05-03',
        },
        {
          name: 'Event 2',
          details: 'Details about event 2',
          start: '2023-05-07',
          end: '2023-05-09',
        },
        {
          name: 'Event 3',
          details: 'Details about event 3',
          start: '2023-05-14',
          end: '2023-05-16',
        },
      ],
      locales: ['en', 'es', 'fr'],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getEventColor({ event }) {
      return event.color;
    },
    weekdayFormat(value) {
      return value.slice(0, 3);
    },
  },
};
</script>
